cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: I learned the tablets of (both) Sumer and Akkad, the scribal art
Like (a mere member of?) the indigenous population(?) I did not write tablets
The scribal art(?), like(!?) a place of wisdom ... a scent(?)
Adding(?), subtracting(?), counting, computation(?), I did in their entirety
Gave wisdom and intelligence generously to me
I am experienced scribe who does not pass by anything
When I rose as (if possessing) the sinew of a leopard
When I galloped mightily like a nisku equid
The heart of An rejoiced for me
In my happiness Enlil spoke truthfully to me
